title: DRAGON BLADE RIVEN
body: So I just opened up my Snow Shop RP sale thingy, and I didn't get Dragon Blade Riven. So I'm just wondering, will Dragon Blade RIven come out, and is there a chance to get the skin in Hexatech chest?

replies.body: Dragon Blade Riven was from the 2014 Lunar Revel event so it's now considered a Legacy Skin. Those skins *can* show up in hextech and mystery gifting, but they do also have the chance of coming back to the shop around their respective holidays!
